Articles.Content:
Add wheels

How do we convert this thread into Enigma III?

We don't, we use the "Off Topic the Off Topic" thread.

How will we become immortal flying DERPSQUIDS?

We fly.

How do we eat potatoes?

We place them into our mouths then chew then swallow.

How to we convince the Mods to let us have a new off-topic thread?

We don't. Because Tyranny.

How dow we educate LeonG17 on changing his Avatar?

You give me a good one

How do I get a good avatar?

Pick an image.

save it to your desktop.

Go to "settings" (right next to profile)

look on the left side and click on edit Avatar.

figure out the rest.

How to Eeloo?

Space! Or SPESS if you prefer

How would you tapdance on elephant-back?

You tranquilize the elephant first then get some tap dancing shoes. Now Tapdance!

How do I pick a image for the avatar?

Find a good one.

How can Pokemon X & Y come out right now?

You tranquilize the elephant first then get some tap dancing shoes. Now Tapdance!

How do I pick a image for the avatar?

I find it hilarious how you're having such a hard time with this. XD

Very poorly.

How should I apologise to a guy for biting him?

Wimper like a puppy and say he smelled like BBQ sauce.

How do you pick between a T-80 tank and a Ilyushin Il-2.

Fight each other against each other. Choose the winner.

How do I stop having violent impulses?

By submitting you soul to me.

How do I understand Mod logic?

You eat the flesh of one to absorb his power (I've listened to too much weird fantasy recently.).

How do I cook without burning the food?

Use a Tsar Bomba. Or use a microwave as it heats it all at once rather than a flame which burns outside but undercooks inside.

How do I not give my soul to Rage?

go on ebay.

Can you make an egg into a grenade if you microwave it then quickly throw it?

No.

How could I have made that not escalate as quickly?

By saying you can ,and make potatoes deadly projectiles.

How can you make a potato gun?

By putting mashed potatoes into a water gun.

How do I make this game harder?

Only use RCS and SRBs.

How does one enjoy a sunset.

Not on Eeloo and with a pina colada.

How does one simply walk into Mordor?

You don't, you get Samwise to carry you.

How does one turn a bag of holding inside out.

By turning it inside out.

What is the meaning of life besides 42.
